definition: Learners evaluating their own work and progress to develop metacognitive skills

positive_examples: Rate your own understanding on a scale of 1-5.
Use the rubric to evaluate your essay before submitting.
What do you think you did well? What would you improve?
Reflecting on your own learning helps you become a more effective learner.
negative_examples: The teacher graded all the essays.
See me after class for feedback on your paper.
training_hints.disambiguation: Learner evaluates own work, not teacher evaluation

simplex_mapping.mapping_rationale: Self-assessment develops learner autonomy and self-regulation
